title: Augusta County: Martha L. Roadcap to Charles and Mary McGuffin, May 12, 1866
summary: Martha Roadcap's letter is primarily addressed to her daughter-in-law, Mary McGuffin. She writes that she will be coming to visit them in Augusta County before too long, but wishes that Mary and Charles would come to visit her as well. The rest of her letter is filled with news about family and friends.
keywords: African Americans, Agriculture, Home Front, Family, Death/Casualties, Women, American Civil War
